NABARD Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 05 Legal Officer and Other posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 16:17 IST
 National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
 5 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 60,000 to 75,000




FOLLOW

The National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 05 Legal Officers, GIS Analyst, and Software Developers Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree, LLB, B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the NABARD Recruitment 2025.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Maharashtra.

NABARD Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Legal Officer	01	LLB
GIS Analyst	03	B.E/ B.Tech
Software Developer	01	M/.E/ M.Tech

Age Limit for the NABARD Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the NABARD Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the NABARD Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 60,000 /- per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 75,000 /-per month.

Application fee for the NABARD Recruitment 2025

For Sc/ ST/ PWBD candidates: Rs. 150 /-
For all Other candidates: Rs. 850 /-
How to Apply for the NABARD Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Legal Officer notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee.
Submit the application form and capture the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	14-08-2025
Last Date of Application	31-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
